doctor.title: Medical Doctor Career Path
steps: Clear NEET entrance exam with high score
Complete MBBS degree (5.5 years including internship)
doctor.notes: Medical profession requires dedication, continuous learning, and strong academic performance. Edit this path based on your specific goals.

engineer.title: Engineering Career Path
steps: Clear JEE Main/Advanced or state CET
Complete BTech/BE in chosen branch (4 years)
Join industry or pursue higher studies
engineer.notes: Engineering offers diverse opportunities in technology, innovation, and problem-solving. Customize this path for your engineering branch.

ca.title: Chartered Accountant Career Path
steps: Clear CA Final exam and start practice
ca.notes: CA is a prestigious career in finance and accounting. Requires strong analytical skills and attention to detail. Customize based on your interests.

upsc.title: Civil Services (IAS/IPS) Career Path
upsc.notes: Civil services offer opportunity to serve the nation. Requires dedication, current affairs knowledge, and strong communication skills.

designer.title: Design Professional Career Path
steps: Build strong portfolio with diverse projects
designer.notes: Design career combines creativity with problem-solving. Build a strong portfolio and stay updated with design trends and tools.

cyber_security.title: Cybersecurity Expert Career Path
steps: Pursue BTech in Computer Science or related field
Gain practical experience in SOC/security teams
cyber_security.notes: Cybersecurity is a rapidly growing field with high demand. Focus on continuous learning and hands-on practice with security tools.

biotech.title: Biotechnology Career Path
steps: Gain laboratory experience and research skills
Work in biotech companies or research institutes
Pursue PhD for advanced research roles
biotech.notes: Biotechnology combines biology with technology to solve real-world problems. Great for those interested in life sciences and innovation.

mba.title: MBA & Management Career Path
steps: Join corporate roles or start own venture
mba.notes: MBA opens doors to leadership roles across industries. Focus on developing business acumen and leadership skills throughout the journey.

law.title: Legal Professional Career Path
steps: Clear CLAT or other law entrance exams
Complete LLB (3 years) or BA LLB (5 years)
Register with Bar Council and start practice
Gain experience in chosen legal specialization
Consider judiciary exams or corporate law roles
law.notes: Law offers diverse career paths from litigation to corporate counsel. Develop strong analytical and communication skills.

pharmacy.title: Pharmacy Professional Career Path
steps: Pursue D.Pharm (2 years) or B.Pharm (4 years)
Choose between retail, clinical, or industrial pharmacy
pharmacy.notes: Pharmacy profession focuses on medication management and patient care. Good option for those interested in healthcare and chemistry.

railway.title: Railway Services Career Path
steps: Prepare for Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) exams
Clear written examination and physical tests
Undergo training at Railway Training Institute
Join designated railway position and grow
railway.notes: Railway jobs offer job security and growth opportunities. Preparation focus should be on current affairs, reasoning, and technical subjects.

police.title: Police Services Career Path
steps: Clear written exam, physical tests, and medical
Complete police training at training academy
police.notes: Police services offer opportunity to serve society and maintain law and order. Requires physical fitness and integrity.

pcm.name: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
pcm.description: Ideal for technical and engineering careers

pcb.name: Physics, Chemistry, Biology
pcb.description: Perfect for medical and life sciences careers

commerce.name: Commerce with Accountancy
commerce.description: Foundation for business and finance careers

arts.name: Arts/Humanities
arts.description: Opens doors to diverse creative and service careers
